WhatWeDo.What: Google Developer Groups (GDGs) are for developers who are interested in Google's developer technology, like:

Activities.Title: Talks
Activities.Description: Get updated with the latest news and announcements

Activities.Title: Codelabs
Activities.Description: Get hands-on experience and guidance from the community members

Activities.Title: Apericode
Activities.Description: Code all together while having an happy hour
